Frequently asked questions

What is a plant extract?

The plant world is full of properties, so scientists have developed specific processes to extract the best from it.
The term "plant extract" is used to describe a substance obtained from a plant source and containing compounds that are beneficial to health: active ingredients.
Plant extracts are a great way to get the benefits of plants into your daily life.
And because pleasure remains our No. 1 objective at Kusmi Tea, we've chosen to combine the effectiveness of these extracts with unforgettable flavors!

What is an active ingredient?

Active ingredients are molecules found directly in nature: in plants, roots, fruits, vegetable oils and so on. They are particularly interesting for their qualities and properties.
Here are some examples of active ingredients you may be familiar with: caffeine in coffee, vitamin C in oranges, and omega-3 in oily fish such as salmon.

What is lemon balm? Why did we decide to use this ingredient for our Sleep blend?

Lemon balm is a perennial herbaceous plant of the Lamiaceae family native to the Mediterranean basin. Its fresh, slightly lemony fragrance makes it a popular aromatic plant. Its use for its beneficial properties dates back more than 2,000 years.
Today, the scientific community recognizes its effects on sleep quality. So we couldn't pass up this natural treasure with its many qualities and properties, and included it in our Rituel Sommeil.

What can we say about rooibos?

Rooibos means "red bush" in Afrikaans, one of South Africa's official languages. For this reason, and because its infusion is also flamboyant, it's nicknamed "red tea" all over the world, even though it contains no theine.

What can we say about verbena?

Verbena is an aromatic plant in the Verbenaceae family. In Roman times, this herb was considered sacred and was said to have magical powers. Verbena was soon used in folk medicine for its relaxing and soothing properties.
